meanings.def: a room or hall with equipment for doing physical exercise, for example in a school
examples: The school has recently built a new gym.
in a gym to play basketball in the gym

meanings.def: a private club where people go to do physical exercise in order to stay or become healthy and fit
examples: at a gym I work out at the gym most days.
I hit the gym at 6.00 again this morning.
You can tell he works out at the gym.

meanings.def: physical exercises done in a gym, especially at school
examples: I played basketball in gym class.
